name: EXT_ORD_SIGNED_SUMMARY
description: This table contains summary information for medication orders from external encounters.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_ORD_SIGNED_SUMMARY
columns.description: The summary of this order. All lines of this order's summary should be concatenated to get the full summary text.
